SELECT b.detect_status detectStatus,b.product_name productName,b.name,b.tally_area_no tallyAreaNo,b.weight,b.weight_unit weightUnit,d.* FROM detect_request d JOIN register_bill b ON d.id=b.detect_request_id WHERE b.detect_status=#{detectStatus}
AND (b.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryName},'%') OR b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryName},'%'))

SELECT b.code billCode, b.created billCreated, b.operation_time operationTime, b.modified billModified, b.operator_name operatorName, b.detect_status detectStatus, b.product_name productName, b.name, b.tally_area_no tallyAreaNo, b.weight, b.weight_unit weightUnit, b.origin_name originName, b.verify_status verifyStatus, b.plate, b.origin_certifiy_url originCertifiyUrl, up.name upStreamName, d.* FROM detect_request d JOIN register_bill b ON d.id = b.detect_request_id LEFT JOIN upstream up ON up.id = b.upstream_id where d.id=#{id}
